column1: Kata Robata////Great atmosphere and excellent EXCELLENT sushi. The customer service was amazing here. I love the thoughtful gestures Â included in the service. For example
column2: after we received our fresh spread of sushi
column3: we were offered to have the shrimp heads deep fried (Do NOT refuse this
column4: trust me). Our underage drinker in the group had an (underage lychee martini)
column5: which had a really nice presentation and taste for a mocktail. I could say so much about this restaurant
column6: and all of it is great. Definitely recommend
